title: Pixel 3XL Picture-In-Picture is buggy and can't be moved around
content:
After the android 11 update, picture in picture stopped working properly. 
1) Engage picture in picture (occurs in all video apps I have tried - YouTube, Netflix, Plex)
2) Picture window appears overlapping the keyboard
3a) Click the window to engage controls
4a) Window moves below the keyboard
3b) Drag the window to move it
4b) Window moves below the keyboard

This results in being unable to return to full screen no matter what I do.
